title: Portrait (France)
medium: Technique: velvet comprised cut and uncut loops of supplementary warps (white, black and rust- orange) in a 7&1 satin foundation (blue)
description: Woven portrait of Jean Marie Jacquard (1752-1834) after a portrait by Bonnefond (1796-1860).

tombstone.epitaph:
Portrait (France). Technique: velvet comprised cut and uncut loops of supplementary warps (white, black and rust- orange) in a 7&1 satin foundation (blue). 
1959-53-2
